name: Syzygy Twist
description:
In astronomy, a syzygy is a straight-line configuration of three (or more) celestial bodies in a gravitational system.

In Syzygy Twist, you must select planets and rotate them around the central sun so that they all line up at the same angle. However, moving planets will cause others to move in turn.

Controls - click on a planet to select it and then click the clockwise or widdershins (that means anti-clockwise) buttons to rotate it around the sun. Once the angles of all planets match, syzygy is achieved.

This is a very early prototype of a game idea, so all comments/suggestions are welcome!
